title: Heads Explode As Tesla CEO Declares The Womb Makes The Woman
description:
As if the latest news about Tesla sales isn’t bad enough, here comes Tesla CEO Elon Musk to throw more gasoline on the dumpster fire — by evoking the gender gap, no less. “If you have a womb, you are a woman. Otherwise, you are not,” the self-declared expert on ... [continued]

The post Heads Explode As Tesla CEO Declares The Womb Makes The Woman appeared first on CleanTechnica.
